mapper.sql: comment_id, friend_circle_id, user_id, content, like_count, root_comment_id, to_comment_id
mapper.insert: insert into friend_circle_comment (friend_circle_id, user_id, content, root_comment_id, to_comment_id ) values (#{friendCircleComment.friendCircleId}, #{friendCircleComment.userId}, #{friendCircleComment.content}, #{friendCircleComment.rootCommentId}, #{friendCircleComment.toCommentId})
